com.nokia.maps.component.touch.button

Class TextButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nokia.maps.component.AbstractMapComponent
      • com.nokia.maps.component.touch.TouchComponent
        • com.nokia.maps.component.touch.VisibleTouchComponent
          • com.nokia.maps.component.touch.button.AbstractButtonComponent
            • com.nokia.maps.component.touch.button.TextButton
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MapComponent

    public abstract class TextButton
extends AbstractButtonComponent
    This class defines an abstract class for MapComponent which display text over a static button on the MapDisplay.

        anchor - Which corner the button is attached to.
